title: Cozy Autumn Nights

diffuser.notes: Add a few drops to your evening diffuser for a calming atmosphere.

spray_optional.note: Shake well before use as a room spray.

why_it_works: The warm, spicy scent of Ginger and the earthy aroma of Frankincense evoke feelings of coziness, while Pine adds a refreshing, grounding note.
safety: Avoid eyes/mucosa; keep from children & pets.
Consult a professional if pregnant, nursing, or under care.
